body_html: it looks like nccl1 is not supported anymore by nvidia and has been replaced. I was actually able to build caffe2 by compiling gcc 7 and compiling caffe with gcc 7 and then compiling the projects that I use caffe in with gcc 8. if I turn nccl off what feature would I loose?
